small_print.text: By continuing you are permitting TrueLayer to use your personalised security credentials to access your account data and use it in order to initiate a payment on your behalf from your bank account. You also agree to our <tosLink>End User Terms of Service</tosLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.
